title: A Record of the Metropolitan Fair in Aid of the United States Sanitary Commission, Held at New York, in April 1864
description: Published by Hurd and Houghton, New York City, 1867; Text and 8 mounted wet-plate albumen photographs of fair exhibits and its participants.  The first six photographs are credited to Jeremiah Gurney and Son, The remaining two to M. Stadtfield.  Cloth and half morocco binding, gilt edges.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
